articles.author: Jamie Grierson
articles.title: Photographer admits prize-winning image was AI-generated - The Guardian
articles.description: German artist Boris Eldagsen says entry to Sony world photography awards was designed to provoke debate
articles.content:
A photographer is refusing a prestigious award after admitting to being a cheeky monkey and generating the prize-winning image using artificial intelligence.
The German artist Boris Eldagsen reveale… [+3885 chars]
